title: Oh Shunpo...
body:
{{champion:55}} Katarina used to do an awesome AA kick after she finished her Shunpo.{{champion:55}} 
The amount of times I have killed people with it, especially if I had Lich Bane for whatever reason.
It was very stylish, IMO.
Does anyone else miss this as much as I do?
Surely it can't be too difficult to put back into the game if it has a high enough demand.
I just thought it was a totally unnecessary feature to take away from her when they did the re-work.

I also noticed that with the new WK Kat skin, she leaves a lovely little flower petal behind from where she was (After the Shunpo).
If people didn't see you Shunpo over a wall... And then come into vision...
Will they see that flower? And know you were there? 
This is a small flaw I see in the skin, hopefully it doesn't cause too many problems for Kat players out there.

Thanks for your time anyway! 
If anyone has any insight to layeth downeth on me-eth...
Please do so.

R.I.P - Shunpo Kick.

See you soon...

replies.body:
It is definitely a cool skin! no doubt about that, i cant say i miss the kick or even noticed it when it was there, i usually try to avoid going near her at all costs 
one of the reasons i main Azir 
but i will definitely be buying this skin,

also the flower will cause no problems at all, because when she uses shunpo normally, she leaves a cloud of smoke anyway, so there is still a visual indicator no matter which skin you use. so it isn't a flaw its just making the smoke look better.

Also shunpo is one of my favourite moves in the game just because its taken from bleach so when ever i play kat (which is hardly ever tho) i feel like Byakuya or Soi Feng, or someone. for this reason i think a stab would be cool because thats what byakuya does when you first see him use shunpo, but a kick works too because of Yorouichi or Soi Feng

but there is 1 reason i dont look forward to this skin being released, as there will be thousands of Kat's instalocking, and while i can beat them as Azir, they are still annoying to fight once the laning phase is over. plus any instalockers on my team means that i cant go mid at all, (remember the project yasuo days)  it could be a blessing in disguise tho, if everyone plays Kat and lots of people get raped and complain, RIOT might start to bring her manaless resets to their attention.
similar to WW and Pantheon recently.

but either way i will be buying this skin, but i do prefer the Vel'koz one still.

Thanks for your input dude, you raise a lot of good points.


As to the "Smoke" from normal Shunpo, that's about as much indications as having bad eye sight, people will just think they see Kat everywhere.

The point I try to make is the simple one of...

Take Sona for instance...
Arcade Sona, possibly the coolest skin there is for her, but it tells them directly which debuff she has applied to them, instead of them having to look at the colour of her Aura.

This could go similar, for the veteran champs to see that Kat has Shunpo'd with the flower, as opposed to just a faint bit of smoke.

Upvotes for input and I would upvote again for the Bleach reference, but I can't. xD


R.I.P Ichimaru Gin
